text.en: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake
And the earth discharges its burdens
And man says, "What is [wrong] with it
That Day, it will report its news
Because your Lord has commanded it

text.ar: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
text.en: That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds

text.ar: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ
text.en: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it

text.ar: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ
text.en: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it
